abstract: Ed Henry is leaving CNN to join the Fox News Channel as its chief White House correspondent.
snippet: Ed Henry is leaving CNN to join the Fox News Channel as its chief White House correspondent.
lead_paragraph: 5:00 p.m. | Updated Ed Henry, CNN’s senior White House correspondent, is leaving that job for the top White House position at the network’s principal rival, the Fox News Channel.

headline.main: CNN’s Ed Henry to Join Fox News
